data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Kolar you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kolar, Karnataka, India

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Kolar
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Kolar, Karnataka, India to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the county of Kolar.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Vanniyan Thigala people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Vanniyan Thigala people know you.
Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the county of Kolar a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Kolar, Karnataka, India that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.section_summary:
the county of Kolar, Karnataka, India has a population of 1,536,400.

We estimate Kolar has 16,900 people who might know Jesus, 18,642 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,500,858 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 16,900 believers in the county of Kolar the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

location.name: Kolar
